weather_report:
As the afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco, sunlight spills generously over the city, painting a warm embrace upon the streets below. The temperature, hovering near 60 degrees, offers a pleasant reprieve and invites urban explorers out into the sunlit squares and winding alleys. With winds whispering gently from the north, the air feels crisp yet comfortable, devoid of the morning fog that sometimes drapes itself over the bay. Today, the horizon is an inviting spectacle; the Golden Gate Bridge stands resolutely defined against a backdrop that is clear for miles, hinting at the ocean's meeting with the blue sky without interruption. 

As evening approaches, temperatures will retreat gently to around 46 degrees, so a light jacket or a cozy sweater will ensure comfort as you stroll through the vibrant streets or linger over a coffee at a local café. With such inviting weather, consider indulging in a leisurely walk along the waterfront or visiting a lesser-known gallery hidden in some of the city's charming neighborhoods. Whether exploring the bustling marketplaces or simply finding a quiet bench to soak in the scene, the day lends itself beautifully to enjoying the simple pleasures that downtown has to offer.
